name: Beavis and Butt-Head
overview: They say that if you get your picture taken doing cool things, you can get to see GWAR and stuff. But taking pictures of yourself playing a video game doesn't count, moron. Based on the successful cartoon 'Beavis and Butt-Head', the game is very faithful to the series. It game stars at the home of Beavis and Butt-Head - and from there you can choose to go to different locations like: Turbo mall 2000, the street, burger world, hospital, GWAR concert and more... your main goal is to find money to the GWAR concert.
